All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
 
Course
The Course class represents a course with a unique course ID and a course name.
CourseDAO
 
CourseDAOImpl
Implementation of the CourseDAO interface for managing courses in the database.
DatabaseUtils
A utility class for managing the database connection.
Student
The Student class represents a student with a unique student ID, first name, and last name.
StudentCourse
A Data Transfer Object (DTO) class that represents the association between a student and a course.
StudentCourseDAO
 
StudentCourseDAOImpl
Implementation of the StudentCourseDAO interface for managing student-course associations in the database.
StudentDAO
 
StudentDAOImpl
Implementation of the StudentDAO interface that provides data access to the Student table.
StudentDAOImplTest
 
Validator
A utility class for validating student and course information.
ValidatorTest
